statements: DELETE FROM savings_goal_notification WHERE goal_amount < 500 AND is_notified = TRUE;
DELETE FROM savings_goal_notification WHERE goal_amount > 500 AND is_notified = true;
DELETE FROM savings_goal_notification WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND notification_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM SavingsProgress WHERE goal_reached = TRUE;
DELETE FROM SavingsProgress WHERE plan_id = 2001 AND current_amount < 500.00;
DELETE FROM SavingsProgress WHERE plan_id = 100 AND current_amount >= 500.00;
DELETE FROM Notifications WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' OR message LIKE '%overdue%';
DELETE FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 101 AND email = 'john.doe@example.com'
